meanings.sent1: After baking the cake, she realized it was dry and needed remoistening.
meanings.sent2: I will remoisten the towel before using it.
meanings.sent3: The plant was so thirsty, it practically begged for remoistening.
meanings.sent4: The rain came down, remoistening the parched earth.
meanings.sent5: He carefully remoistened the clay to shape it into a new sculpture.

meanings.definition: The act of adding moisture back to something.
meanings.sent1: The remoistening of the soil helped the plants grow better.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the remoistening of the air after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The remoistening of the sponge made it usable again.
meanings.sent4: The remoistening of the bread made it fresh once more.
meanings.sent5: The remoistening of the skin was soothing after a long day in the sun.
